Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.persistence

Class PersistenceGameInfo

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.persistence.PersistenceGameInfo
public class PersistenceGameInfo extends Object
PersistenceGameInfo contains all information that is needed to be saved from a game, this information will be used to properly restore a game that was previously saved on file.

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame() throws URISyntaxException, IOException
      Save the persistence data on a json file
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if there was an error the file creation
      IOException - if it was not possible to write information on the file
